ccre.net

Interface NetworkProvider


  • public interface NetworkProvider
    A Network provider, which provides access to the basic networking functionality of the platform.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getPlatformType()
      Gets a string representing the platform type for this system.
      boolean isTimeoutException(java.io.IOException ex)
      Checks if the specified exception was thrown due to a timeout while reading from a socket.
      CCollection<java.lang.String> listIPv4Addresses()
      List all IPv4 addresses of the current system.
      ClientSocket openClient(java.lang.String targetAddress, int port)
      Open a client socket to the specified target address and port.
      ServerSocket openServer(int port)
      Open a server socket to listen on the specified port.

    • Method Detail

      • openClient

        ClientSocket openClient(java.lang.String targetAddress,
                      int port)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Open a client socket to the specified target address and port.
        Parameters:
        targetAddress - the IP address to connect to.
        port - the port to connect to.
        Returns:
        the ClientSocket that represents the connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • openServer

        ServerSocket openServer(int port)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Open a server socket to listen on the specified port.
        Parameters:
        port - the port to listen on.
        Returns:
        the ServerSocket that represents the connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a server cannot be started.

      • listIPv4Addresses

        CCollection<java.lang.String> listIPv4Addresses()
        List all IPv4 addresses of the current system. This includes 127.0.0.1.
        Returns:
        a collection of the IPv4 addresses of the current system.

      • getPlatformType

        java.lang.String getPlatformType()
        Gets a string representing the platform type for this system. This is used by CluckNode to create a node ID.
        Returns:
        The platform type string.

      • isTimeoutException

        boolean isTimeoutException(java.io.IOException ex)
        Checks if the specified exception was thrown due to a timeout while reading from a socket.
        Parameters:
        ex - the IO exception to check
        Returns:
        if the exception was thrown due to a timeout.
